name: Sage Genevieve
bio: Sage is a veteran River Guide. She knows the river like the back of her hand.

name: Reeve Jones
bio: Reeve has spent the last 2 years with Salmon River Adventures and has gained the experience to prove it!

name: Gavin Bennett
bio: Gavin is new this summer, but is learning from the best is and has the best team teaching him the ropes.
